# iosxr_tftp_client (Resource)

This resource can manage the TFTP Client configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_tftp_client" "example" {
  client_vrfs = [
    {
      vrf_name         = "VRF1"
      source_interface = "Loopback0"
      retries          = 10
      timeout          = 30
      dscp             = "default"
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `client_vrfs` (Attributes List) VRF name for TFTP service (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--client_vrfs))
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--client_vrfs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `client_vrfs`

Required:

- `vrf_name` (String) VRF name for TFTP service

Optional:

- `dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint) for TFTP Client Packets
- `retries` (Number) Specify the number of retries when client requests TFTP connections
  - Range: `0`-`256`
- `source_interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in TFTP connections
- `timeout` (Number) Specify the timeout for every TFTP connection in seconds
  - Range: `0`-`256`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_tftp_client.example ""
```
